attributes.action: All animal cruelty crimes towards all animals should result in prison sentences
attributes.additional_details: We see too many acts of animal cruelty & not enough legal action taken against those committing the crimes. There are too many death's of cats & dog's especially with people only receiving suspended sentences & banned from owning pets, these people should be tried treated & charged with neglect, physical harm towards an animal, gbh, abh, murder of an animal & sentenced to serve time in prison like any other person who committs a crime against a human being.
attributes.background: To change the laws regarding all animal cruelty crimes including all animals in the UK including wildlife, all fish, farm & livestock, cats & dogs etc. No more suspended sentences & fines or ban's on owning pets & more prison sentences served.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Introduce stricter minimum penalties for acts of animal cruelty.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701925
